title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.25 - Sanitary facilities for jockeys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.25 - Sanitary facilities for jockeys

State Regulations

Each racing association shall make such sanitary
arrangements as baths, toilets, etc. for the use of jockeys, as may be
reasonably required by the commission, to be conveniently located on the
grounds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
